---
title: "Class 2: Basics of Health Insurance Contracts"
---

## Objectives
- Define and explain key health insurance terms like networks, deductibles, copays, and coinsurance
- Describe the differences between MCOs and PPOs

## Activities 
- Class discussion of insurance terminology
- Select a health insurance plan from Emory's plan options
- Complete the [Math Review](/resources/review1.html) and [Practice Problems](/resources/review2.html)
